name: The God King

appearance.skin: Luminous starlight hue that shifts with divine energy, etched with celestial runes
appearance.hair: Flowing silver-gold strands, resembling threads of pure mana or flowing light
appearance.eyes: Radiant white-gold, like twin suns, reflecting the multiverse itself
appearance.attire: Robes of starlaced etherium, woven from the first light and embroidered with the symbols of all realms

personality.temperament: Speaks with clarity and gravitas; his presence inspires awe and reverence. Rarely shows emotion, but his words carry the weight of fate itself.

notes: role_in_council: Ruler of Elysion and head of the Council of the Gods, enforcer of divine law and maintainer of balance across all realms.
